# One Time Email Access Guard

> A concise overview of the One Time Email Access Guard website: a landing page presenting the WordPress plugin that enables passwordless access via one-time email codes, with features, documentation, and download links.

## Summary
One Time Email Access Guard is a WordPress plugin designed to grant access to specific posts and pages using secure one-time email codes. This site (hosted at https://access-guard.github.io/) provides product information, features overview, and guidance on installation and use. The plugin is distributed under the GPLv2 or later license.

## Main Links
- [Homepage](https://access-guard.github.io/): Plugin overview and introduction.
- [Plugin Repository (if applicable)](https://wordpress.org/plugins/one-time-email-access-guard/): Source code and releases (GPL-2.0-or-later).
- [Documentation or Features Summary](https://access-guard.github.io/): Key features and usage details.
